input.sentences: [female] was having a nice day | but she wanted to go out to eat .
she decided to get some food but the market had moved . so she headed somewhere else .
three males sit and wait for their dinner not knowing their friend [female] was headed over .
they ate and walked next door to an ice cream shop where they spotted [female] heading their way .
[female] stops them in the hallway deciding to eat ice cream with her friends .
output.sentences: I love choco stuff and today I got some.
We had to find the new location of the store.
We were so glad when we found it.
We had so many choco foods and some drinks too.
We still wanted more but decided the candy and ice cream was enough and chilled out.
